ComicInfo.Summary: NEW STORY ARC! Enter: Negate. He has the ability to remove a super-human's power once and for all - and he's set his sights on the Savage Dragon! Will our humble hero be turned into a normal Joe? Will we finally get a clue about Dragon's mysterious origin?
